links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
mathematica: NSum[1/(2^2^m - 1), {m, 0, Infinity}, WorkingPrecision -> 99] // RealDigits // First (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Feb 12 2013 *)
prog: (PARI) { default(realprecision, 20080); x=suminf(m=0, 1/(2^2^m - 1)); for (n=1, 20000, d=floor(x); x=(x-d)*10; write("b048649.txt", n, " ", d)); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, May 07 2009
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: Deleted old PARI program. - _Harry J. Smith_, May 20 2009
